message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more to me than that.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $9,000. How about $8,500? I'm trying to stay within my budget.
